titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the free exportation of woollen manufactures, until the twenty fifth day of December next
Proclamations. 1667-03-29.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: In the Savoy, printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker, His Majesties printers,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the 29th day of March, in the Nineteenth year of Our Reign. 1667.".
Arms 75; Steele notation: of turers practise.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
